name: Katina Saga 6: Bedlam on Barraban
description: Katina, Zax, and Gehirn set off to do battle with the Badoon Empire to secure the Bands of Might, while Hu-Man is off on a quest of his own for the Mind's Eye. Follow hero and villain as they set off in search of the God Artifacts. Exciting battles, dangerous puzzles, and non-stop action make Katina 6: Bedlam on Barraban the most intense entry to date.
